description: This is the data pipeline for the entire protocol data

params: the name of the data source to load into the datalake
maximum number of items to load into the data lake
true if the load operation is succesful
methods.description: This will load data from the source and publish the data to the predefined data lake

params: The schema of the data source after the transformation
The data source to grab the data from
The function which will be applied to the data source
The data after being transformed and validated with the given schema
methods.description: Given a schema, data source and a transformation function this method will apply the transformation to the data from the data source and return the transformed data

properties: This will set what version of the database routes to send the request to, i.e v1 will set /v1/endpoint
